title: Show "away" when I lock my screen
body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
I want to have Teams show as "away" when I lock my screen, this doesn't happen due to my choice in window manager / screen lock.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
add a cli option to either:
- send a http request as if it was from inside the app, this would enable me to simply extract the correct request using dev tools and do e.g.: `teams-for-linux curl 'https://presence.teams.microsoft.com/v1/me/forceavailability/' -X 'PUT' --data-raw '{"availability":"Away"}'
- dedicated function for this, and maybe other things in the future, e.g.: `teams-for-linux set-availibility away`

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
Manually set my self to `away` every time I lock my screen and unset it afterward.
